overview:
Mr. TOMMY Habeeb has been busy executive producing, writing and hosting such hit shows as “STAG: a test of love”, “Billionaires Car Club”(hosted by Andrew Firestone), and producing and syndicating the mixed martial arts TV series phenomenon the “Art Of War.” Additionally he is credited with making dozens of television pilots and national commercials.

Currently Habeeb is enjoying huge success worldwide with “STAG: a test of love”, a new reality show that documents the misadventures of couples, days before they walk down the aisle.
